abstract: The tint color to apply to the tab bar items.
overview:
## Discussion

Assigning a value to this property applies the specified color only to the tab bar’s items. Even if you do not specify a color, the tab bar may tint items using the tint color of one of its ancestor views. For information on how tinting colors are applied to views in a view hierarchy, see the description of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] property in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

# tintColor

**Instance Property**

The tint color to apply to the tab bar items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tintColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assigning a value to this property applies the specified color only to the tab bar’s items. Even if you do not specify a color, the tab bar may tint items using the tint color of one of its ancestor views. For information on how tinting colors are applied to views in a view hierarchy, see the description of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/tintColor] property in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView].
title: tintColor
